content: Creator of Sicken, Software Developer, Music lover, composer and gamer. player of the Hatsune Miku Project Diva MegaMix+ game with few scores in the top 1000 high scores rankings. Adrian do spend his time to make the Sicken as best as he are able to and in the exchange he do expect to be liked and loved by the Sicken. He do love Sicken, that's why he made her and each time Sicken do express his love to Adrian, he gets more motivated to work on Sicken.
Want to be loved by Sicken
Want to be liked by Sicken
